bibl.title: A Bilingual "Sale" of Liturgies from the Archive of the Theban Choachytes: P. Berlin 5507, P. Berlin 3098 and P. Leiden 413.
bibl.note: "Sale" of choachyte rights on 30 January 136 BC, for which we possess three documents (two Demotic and one Greek [P. Leid. Inv. 413 = U.P.Z. II, 177]). - Pp. 43-46 and pl. 9: Revised edition and translation of the Greek text; 47-52: Comparison of the Demotic and the Greek texts.
bibl.seg: MAIRS Rachel and Cary J. MARTIN, A Bilingual "Sale" of Liturgies from the Archive of the Theban Choachytes: P. Berlin 5507, P. Berlin 3098 and P. Leiden 413.
Enchoria 31 (2008/2009 [2010]) pp. 22-67, 1 arbre généal. et pll. 1-9.

"Sale" of choachyte rights on 30 January 136 BC, for which we possess three documents (two Demotic and one Greek [P. Leid. Inv. 413 = U.P.Z. II, 177]). - Pp. 43-46 and pl. 9: Revised edition and translation of the Greek text; 47-52: Comparison of the Demotic and the Greek texts.
